metadata.name: Metaverse Development | Unit A1
metadata.description:
Ameruverse is a metaverse design and development agency, specializing in immersive browser based virtual experiences. Our goal is to provide our customers with innovative solutions for virtual worlds and applications, not empty plots.

Do you have ideas you'd like to turn into virtual realities?

This NFT, enables Ameruverse customers to fund, design, develop, and deploy a custom Monaverse experience. If you bring your own Sandbox or Decentraland plots, we can develop those too.

This NFT is for metaverse development after initial consultations.  
Contact info@ameruverse.com to book your consultation.
